```{r}
multifunct <- function(x, y)
{
  return(x*y)
}

multifunct(1,3)
```

```{r}
factfunct <- function(val)
{
  if(val < 1)
  {
    return(1)
  }
  else
  {
    return(val * factfunct(val-1))
  }
}

factfunct(4)
```

```{r}
factof5 <- factfunct(5)
print(factof5)
```
